title: I am getting cse(aiml) in pes electronic city campus and cse(ai) in mit bangalore which would be a better option?

comments.body: anything in pes ec is equivalent to pes rr ( placement wise atleast ).. Also check the syllabus for pes(aiml) and mitb(ai) , its very different. Theres no Operating systems , Computer Networks , Compiler Design and a few more topics in MITB Syllabus and no ML at all , just AI.... In terms of syllabus and placements id recommend PES.
